tls:text.tls:line: 'The tiger hunts all the animals of the forest and devours them,

sense.def: tiger

tls:text.tls:line: 'The tiger hunts all the animals of the forest and devours them,

sense.def: crave; seek for; sometimes close to: ask for (something negative or neutral in meaning); try to find

sense.def: all the; the various

tls:text.tls:line: The tiger did indeed doubt the fox

sense.def: take it to be the case that S(often in polite speech:) to think (rightly, as in HF 7.2.3) that, to believe that 臣以為，甚以為不然; be convinced that, feel that

tls:text.tls:line: The tiger did indeed doubt the fox

sense.def: the contextually determinate S is true; it is so (mostly, the word in this meaning is used pro-sententially, as a pro-sentence)

tls:text.tls:line: and the king showed him the carbuncle on his face.

sense.def: serious lasting disease; sometimes generalised: natural disease, sickness

tls:text.tls:line: Pien-ch'iao offered to remove it

sense.def: 子犯請擊之"Zǐfàn asked to attack them"ask permission (to do what what one would like to do); [The person whose permission is asked should also be in the structure as being always understood. There are quite a number of such cases. CH]

tls:text.tls:line: whereupon she ordered his concubine to ladle the poisoned wine and present it to him.

sense.def: serve (wine); SHI 246: ladle out; ladle from; HANSHU uses the second graph in a literal sense

tls:text.tls:srcline: 於是因令其妾酌藥酒而進之。
tls:text.tls:line: whereupon she ordered his concubine to ladle the poisoned wine and present it to him.

sense.def: come forward with and present

tls:text.tls:srcline: 於是因令其妾酌藥酒而進之。
tls:text.tls:line: whereupon she ordered his concubine to ladle the poisoned wine and present it to him.

sense.def: referring to an aforementioned object: him, her, it

tls:text.tls:line: "If I give my master this to drink,

sense.def: I (unmarked, non-contrastive, weak)

tls:text.tls:line: "If I give my master this to drink,

sense.def: object marker: e.g. 子以四教"The Master taught four things" [[CLEAN UP ATTRIBUTIONS!!!]

tls:text.tls:line: "If I give my master this to drink,

sense.def: this person; these people (mostly plural) =此人; this concrete thing = 此物

tls:text.tls:line: His concubine knew about the plan

sense.def: concubine

tls:text.tls:line: His concubine knew about the plan

sense.def: N has the kinship relation N to PRO

tls:text.tls:line: His concubine knew about the plan

sense.def: know, be sure of; know all about

tls:text.tls:line: His concubine knew about the plan

sense.def: refers to the aforementioned situation

tls:text.tls:line: then it will kill him.

sense.def: then given this situation

tls:text.tls:line: If I tell my master about this matter,

sense.def: object marker: e.g. 子以四教"The Master taught four things" [[CLEAN UP ATTRIBUTIONS!!!]

tls:text.tls:line: If I tell my master about this matter,

sense.def: this, these 此人
tomorrow, the following day
the next day

tls:text.tls:line: can always pick up dainties and tidbits for his parents.

sense.def: what is delicious> delicacies

tls:text.tls:line: "I have not heard of it", replied the king.

sense.def: "the general point is": particle marking a generalising judgment

tls:text.tls:line: if I have obliged another, I must behave

sense.def: if; if ever S; even if ever

tls:text.tls:line: as though I remember nothing of it.

sense.def: modal particle which emphasises the apodosis (sometimes also of a concessive clause in 'even if) as typically general and inevitable.

tls:text.tls:line: I cannot afford to forget it;

sense.def: modal particle which emphasises the apodosis (sometimes also of a concessive clause in 'even if) as typically general and inevitable.

tls:text.tls:line: because he hopes to send me to attack Kuan.

sense.def: because the before-mentioned subject aims to V

tls:text.tls:line: will surely make the world laugh.

sense.def: modal particle which emphasises the apodosis (sometimes also of a concessive clause in 'even if) as typically general and inevitable.

tls:text.tls:line: 'and into his hand was given a copy of the laws of your royal archieves.

sense.def: with one's own hands, with a hand; in his own hands

tls:text.tls:line: 'and into his hand was given a copy of the laws of your royal archieves.

sense.def: written basic laws; administrative regulations XUN 1: administrative regulations; procedural statutes 行憲 "implement statutes"

tls:text.tls:line: that the son who kills his father

sense.def: assassinate (a superior), whether one's ruler, parent, or elder sibling. Sometimes incirectly through a hired assassin

tls:text.tls:line: and the minister who murders his ruler

sense.def: assassinate (a superior), whether one's ruler, parent, or elder sibling. Sometimes incirectly through a hired assassin

tls:text.tls:line: are forever ineligible for amnesty.

sense.def: be forgiven, be pardoned; also: be aquited because not guilty

tls:text.tls:line: Also, though the state proclaim a special amnesty,

sense.def: pardon culprits; conduct an amnesty

tls:text.tls:line: so that proper action between father and son may be preserved.

sense.def: duties between the Ns

tls:text.tls:line: The first item of this law says

sense.def: basic laws; administrative regulations XUN 1: administrative regulations; procedural statutes 行憲 "implement statutes"

seg.line: 是使我負襄王詔而廢大府之憲也，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是使我負襄王詔而廢大府之憲也，
tls:text.tls:line: which would force me to transgress the orders of King Hsiang and break the laws in your archives.

sense.def: written basic laws; administrative regulations XUN 1: administrative regulations; procedural statutes 行憲 "implement statutes"

tls:text.tls:line: 'When I was young', said Wei Chia,' I used to be enamoured of archery,

sense.def: 少之時 VP-X, as a subordinate clause, modifies the NP-Y forming a complex topicalised NP

tls:text.tls:line: 'When I was young,

sense.def: 少之時 VP-X, as a subordinate clause, modifies the NP-Y forming a complex topicalised NP

tls:text.tls:line: When the Middle Kingdoms are at war with Ch'in,

sense.def: N2 is owned by N1; N2 is the property of N1

tls:text.tls:line: it would be like a wolf in the flocks.

sense.def: 譬如為山"It is like building up a mound": It is like V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: Or, take stablemen handling a chariot.

sense.def: For example N

tls:text.tls:line: Or, take stablemen handling a chariot.

sense.def: relative clause marker

tls:text.tls:line: it would be like letting slip the Han-lu hound14

sense.def: be like V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: and like the mouth of the tiger.

sense.def: may be properly compared with

seg.line: 王求士於髡，譬若挹水於河，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 王求士於髡，譬若挹水於河，

sense.def: or else??? 而貸焉 "or else you will (have to) borrow from them

sense.def: body

sense.def: the body of the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: and his body trembled.

sense.def: body

tls:text.tls:line: Chung-shan mustered her troops and met both Yen and Chao.

sense.def: all objects; all objects completely

sense.def: all objects; all objects completely

tls:text.tls:line: would muster all the troops he had and smite Ch'u.

sense.def: all objects; all objects completely

tls:text.tls:line: mustered all the rest of their troops to follow the expedition.

sense.def: all objects; all objects completely

tls:text.tls:line: I constantly long to muster all the rest of my troops and attack her.

sense.def: all objects; all objects completely

tls:text.tls:line: yet you would muster the rest of its troops for an offensive against Ch'i.

sense.def: all objects; all objects completely

sense.def: all objects; all objects completely

tls:text.tls:line: it has been completely mobilized,

sense.def: all objects; all objects completely

tls:text.tls:line: so that he would have to return all the lands he has invaded-

sense.def: all objects; all objects completely

sense.def: all

tls:text.tls:line: The king fled, his ministers followed,

sense.def: all

seg.line: 三戰入郢，寡君身出，大夫悉屬，百姓離散。使下臣來告亡，且求救。』

tls:text.tls:srcline: 三戰入郢，寡君身出，大夫悉屬，百姓離散。使下臣來告亡，且求救。』
tls:text.tls:line: Wu has entered our capital after three battles by Lake Chy. Our ruler has fled, the ministers have followed, and our people are scattered everywhere. This low functionary has been sent to report our loss and beg succour."

sense.def: all

tls:text.tls:line: and our people were scattered everywhere,

sense.def: all

tls:text.tls:line: T'ien Tan undid his own fur cloak and wrapped the old man.

tls:text.tls:line: T'ien Tan undid his own fur cloak and wrapped the old man.

tls:text.tls:line: T'ien Tan undid his own fur cloak and wrapped the old man.

sense.def: threaten; menace

sense.def: confront, set upon, attack
move threateningly towards; move against; turn against

sense.def: you (on behalf of your state)
be on distant terms, not be on intimate terms; have hostile relations

tls:text.tls:line: Der Fürst von Zhōu [war in größter Sorge darüber

sense.def: Dong Zhou jun 東周君 or Dong Zhou Wen gong 東周文公, r. 255-249 BCE without the title of king

tls:text.tls:line: Ich wünschte, Eure Majestät würde dies bedenken!"

sense.def: picture for oneself, imagine (an object or a state of affairs); think carefully about; take into consideration
the sense of duty, the rectitude of N

tls:text.tls:line: "Auf welchem Weg soll ich sie denn dann nach Qí transportieren lassen?"

sense.def: after all
be equal to, to be equated with

tls:text.tls:line: oder das wie ein Pferd durchgeht, wenn ein Hase auftaucht,

sense.def: run away (from the contextually determinate place); make off, flee; leave the scene

tls:text.tls:line: das in Qí eintrifft wie Wasser, das (in den Boden) einsickert.

sense.def: in a natural way like water that seeps into the soil
